related_questions.question: Why is borobudur temple called a historical building in indonesia

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

Why is borobudur temple called a historical building in indonesia?

It is because The Borobudur Temple is an ancient building that stands through the test of time, it even stands tall until now. That is why The Borobudur Temple is called a historical building in Indonesia.

Penjelasan:

Hal itu dikarenakan Candi Borobudur merupakan bangunan kuno yang bertahan melewati ujian waktu, bahkan bangunannya masih berdiri gagah sampai sekarang. Itulah sebabnya Candi Borobudur disebut sebagai bangunan bersejarah di Indonesia.

Semoga bermanfaat ya.

related_questions.question: kotak amal di masjid al aqsa menyerupai kubus, jika masing-masing kotak amal memiliki panjang rusuk 5cm maka volume ketiga kotak amal adalah...cm³​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

v1 = s³= s×s×s

= 5×5×5

=125cm³

v2= s³= s×s×s

= 5×5×5

=125cm³

v3 = s³= s×s×s

= 5×5×5

=125cm³

v1+v2+v3 = 125+125+125

= 375cm³

Penjelasan:

maaf kalau salah

related_questions.question:
Read the text and answer the following questions !    One day I flew from Denpasar to Makasar. I went with Kevin and Kathrin. Kevin is the Project Manager for Cool Radio English and Kathrin is the Program Officer for AuSAID.

The pilot said something over the intercom in Bahasa Indonesia. I did not understand him. I asked someone sitting near me for a clue. I looked out the window and could see the tires on my side of the plane lowering. I felt a little weak in the knees. I realized I had been holding my breath for a quite a while

1. From where the writer flew?

2. Who is Kevin?

3. Who is Kathrin?

4. Did the writer understand with Bahasa Indonesia?

5. What is the writer feeling when he looked out the window?


bantuin kak nyelesain misi, harus bener, salah report​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

2.kevin is theProject Manager fot cool radio english

3.kathrin is the program officer for AuSaid

.

Jawaban:

1. Denpasar

2. Kevin is the Project Manager for Cool Radio English

3. Kathrin is the Program Officer for AuSAID.

4. No, he did not.

5. He felt a little weak in the knees

Penjelasan:

Mga membantu

related_questions.question: Tulisan Arab .innal insaana fii akhsani takwin​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

الْإِنْسٰنَ فِىٓ أَحْسَنِ تَقْوِيْمٍ

Penjelasan:

At Tin: Buah Tin

وَالتِّيْنِ وَالزَّيْتُوْنِ ﴿التين:١

wattiini waz zaituun

1. Demi (buah) Tin dan (buah) Zaitun,

وَطُوْرِ سِيْنِيْنَ ﴿التين:٢

watuuri siiniin

2. demi Gunung Sinai,

وَهٰذَا الْبَلَدِ الْأَمِيْنِ ﴿التين:٣

wahaadzal baladil amiin

3. dan demi negeri (Mekah) yang aman ini;

لَقَدْ خَلَقْنَا الْإِنْسٰنَ فِىٓ أَحْسَنِ تَقْوِيْمٍ ﴿التين:٤

laqod kholaqnal insaana fii ahsani taqwiim

4. Sungguh, Kami telah menciptakan manusia dalam bentuk yang sebaik-baiknya,

ثُمَّ رَدَدْنٰهُ أَسْفَلَ سٰفِلِيْنَ ﴿التين:٥

tsumma rodadnaahu asfala saafiliin

5. kemudian Kami kembalikan dia ke tempat yang serendah-rendahnya,

إِلَّا الَّذِيْنَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ الصّٰلِحٰتِ فَلَهُمْ أَجْرٌ غَيْرُ مَمْنُوْنٍ ﴿التين:٦

illal ladziina aamanuu wa’amilus shoolihaati falahum ajrun ghoiru mamnuun

6. kecuali orang-orang yang beriman dan mengerjakan kebajikan; maka mereka akan mendapat pahala yang tidak ada putus-putusnya,

فَمَا يُكَذِّبُكَ بَعْدُ بِالدِّيْنِ ﴿التين:٧

famaa yukadzdzibuka ba’du bid diin

7. Maka apa yang menyebabkan (mereka) mendustakanmu (tentang) hari pembalasan setelah (adanya keterangan-keterangan) itu?

أَلَيْسَ اللهُ بِأَحْكَمِ الْحٰكِمِيْنَ ﴿التين:٨

alaisalloohu bi-ahkamil haakimiin

8. Bukankah Allah hakim yang paling adil?
